AREACONNECTMost reliable logistic company with a vast
network of agents and centers creating the
best connection for you by us.DISCOVER MORELEARN MOREGET IT NOW Previous Next

CALL CENTER

Call or WhatsApp us on
+2349031322244
+2347047973166

WORKING HOURS

Mon-Sat: 7AM-5PM Sunday: 9AM-3PM

OUR LOCATION

Suite 3 BM House Plaza, Ladoke Akintola Boulevard, Garki 2 Abuja.

GLOBAL OFFICE

Blk 12 Suite 10, Sura Shopping complex, Obalende Lagos.

CALL CENTER

Call or WhtasApp us on +2349031322244
+2347047973166

WORKING HOURS

Mon - Fri
8AM - 5PM

OUR LOCATION

Suite 3 BM House Plaza, Ladoke Akintola Boulevard, Garki 2 Abuja

GLOBAL OFFICE

Blk 12, Suite 10, Sura Shopping complex, Obalende, Lagos

LOGISTICS (GOLDLINE)

We are a force to reckon with when it comes to all round logistics services ranging from intra-state, inter-state and international deliveries.

LEARN MORE >

E-COMMERCE (ALLSHOP)

This is where online stores make more sales with little effort getting products to their customers as buying, selling and delivery meets and become one.

LEARN MORE >

HIRE-PURCHASE

We give out cars and bikes creating more jobs and solving logistic issues and we also accept cars from investors on hire-purchase and guarantee ROI.

LEARN MORE >

Our Testimonial

What customers say about us

We place customer satisfaction as a priority as our customer care lines are open 24 hrs 7 days

Areaconnect has never disappointed as they're delivery services are effect and fast, there riders are also customer friendly

 5/5

-Ama Gifty

-James Golden

What i like about areaconnect is there customer service and tech supports as they're friendly and always willing to attend to you.

 5/5

Ama Gifty

-Yinka Fashanu

REGION MARKET SHARE 0% REVENUE GROWTH PER YEAR 0% REGION MARKET SHARE 0% PROFIT GROWTH PER YEAR 0% REGION MARKET SHARE 0% NUMBER OF LOGISTICS CENTERS 0% REGION MARKET SHARE 0%

Our Year In Numbers

With our vast network of deliveries within and outside Nigeria it's a certainly a win win situation for both us and our customers/clients.

Latest Blog & News

Take time to go through our blog posts as it contains a wide range of information's 

that's interesting and educative and enlightens you more about our services

item.title: Track
item.dc:creator: areaconnect
item.content:encoded: [wpcargo_trackform]

item.title: ABOUT
item.dc:creator: areaconnect
item.content:encoded:
Our Services

Areaconnect is not just a logistics company but a licensed logistics platform. We have been involved in delivering packages for many years before entering the digital space. We are the one stop solution to get all your logistics needs met.

CUSTOMER CARE

Our customer service is 24 hours 7 days applying the best customer service practices in which customer satisfaction is our priority

DISPATCH BIKE

We guarantee fast and safe delivery of your package the same day to any destination of your choice

INTER-STATE

You can be rest assured when using us for your inter-state deliveries as we have service centers all over Nigeria

PROTECTION POLICY

With our Goods In Transit Insurance policy you can be rest assured that your package is totally safe.

INTERNATIONAL

We safely deliver your package any where in the world no matter the climate or destination.

3000 + SAFE CARGO 500 + WARE HOUSE 2 + OPERATING COUNTRIES 250 + SERVICE CENTERS

Become Our Partners

Are you a logistic operator or do you wish to invest your money? Then we've got you covered. When you partner with us at AreaConnect, we give you nothing but the best. You get more job offers daily, making more money. As an investor; we invest your money in logistic/transport business wisely and you get not just value for your money but guaranteed return on investment.

Furthermore we also have other partnership programs, whereby shop owners, store owners, kiosk and POS stands can become our delivery agents. This means that your outlet will serve as AreaConnect delivery centers where customers can come order for logistic services and you earn commission on every delivery offered.

REGISTER

item.title: SERVICES
item.dc:creator: areaconnect
item.content:encoded:
COURIER SERVICES

Do you have time sensitive orders that require scheduled times for pickup and delivery? Whether legal documents, medical specimen, medical record, bank documents or any other important and timely document, we at Areaconnect have got you covered. With our network of errand boy/girls, specially trained to use every available means possible to deliver on schedule, you can be sure your package will be delivered on time.

Get a quote

MOVING VANS

Whether you are moving from one apartment to another or you require delivery of one or more household or office items, e.g refrigerator, chairs, electronics etc, then this is your last bus stop, no more searching. With our large marketplace of Van operators, you will not only get a van immediately you need one, you will also get it at a great price!.

Get a quote

HAULAGE TRUCKS

Tipping trucks, covered trucks, uncovered trucks, 5,15,20,30, 45 or more ton trucks and even oil tankers and water tankers, we have it all!. For any intra-state inter-state or international haulage service, we got you covered!.

Get a quote

Why Choose Us As Provider

AreaConnect is a licensed logistics company that provides delivery services all over the worlds and is a partner and Official Delivery Partner to Allshop and AreaHire Companies. It is our vision to power e-commerce in Nigeria and in the whole of Africa. There is no e-commerce without logistics, and today there is no logistics without innovation.

AreaConnect can handle every kind of delivery, no matter what size. A wide range of shipping options for a better, faster and bigger on-demand delivery service.

REGION MARKET SHARE 0% REVENUE GROWTH PER YEAR 0% PROFIT GROWTH PER YEAR 0% NUMBER OF LOGISTICS CENTERS 0%

CALL CENTER

Allshop is a multivendor e-commerce platform (app and website). It consists of the AllShop customer app, AllShop vendor app and Allshop delivery app. Sell on All Shop and Areaconnect delivers.

WORKING HOURS

Goldline is an artificial intelligence Chabot used to order for all types of logistics. It automatically takes your orders and gives you an estimate cost of your delivery anyday anytime Goldline is on Whatsapp.

OUR LOCATION

We receive goods and products from customers, warehouse and deliver them to any buyer upon the instructions of our customer. We receive from our customers both goods sold online and via other platform and deliver.

GLOBAL OFFICE

We give out vehicles and motorcycles via our AreaHire app. All the rider or driver need do is to go to our Areahire app on google play store or iOs app store to apply for the bike or car they so desire.

E-COMMERCE: ALLSHOP APP

Allshop is a multivendor e-commerce platform (app and website). It consists of the AllShop customer app, AllShop vendor app and Allshop delivery app. Sell on All Shop and Areaconnect delivers

A.I CHATBOT: GOLDLINE

Goldline is an artificial intelligence Chabot used to order for all types of logistics. It automatically takes your orders and gives you an estimate cost of your delivery anyday anytime Goldline is on Whatsapp.

RECIEVE GOODS & WAREHOUSE

We receive goods and products from customers, warehouse and deliver them to any buyer upon the instructions of our customer. We receive from our customers both goods sold online and via other platform and deliver.

RIDERS & DRIVER: AREAHIRE APP

We give out vehicles and motorcycles via our AreaHire app. All the rider or driver need do is to go to our Areahire app on google play store or iOs app store to apply for the bike or car they so desire.

item.title: CONTACT
item.dc:creator: areaconnect
item.content:encoded:
Send Us A Message

[forminator_form id="187"]

OUR LOCATIONS

Shop 12/10, blk A, Babtunde Fashola Close, Sura Shopping Complex, Simpson Str, Ikoyi, Lagos, Nigeria.

GET IN TOUCH

You can get in touch with us via email on info@areaconnect.com.ng
areaconnectng1@gmail.com

HOTLINE 24/7

Call or Whatsapp any of our customer care lines
+2349031322244
+2348143895608

ABOUT US

Areaconnect is not just a logistics company but a licensed logistics platform. We have been involved in delivering packages for many years before entering the digital space. We are the one stop solution to get all your logistics needs met.

item.title: FORMAT 2 LOGISTIC OPERATOR FORM
item.dc:creator: areaconnect
item.content:encoded:
Good day,
Thank you for Registering to join the Areaconnect Network as a logistics/transport operator.
We are pleased to have you on our team.
The first thing is for you to undergo training in order to understand our rules and regulations, the way our Apps works and all our platforms available to you as a registered operator on our network.
Please join the following training groups based on the type of logistics and transport service you provide:
1. Dispatch bikes:
https://chat.whatsapp.com/CwdPl9TmDkOI9fWTUQcgLm

item.title: STARTING A DELIVERY AGENCY/COMPANY IN NIGERIA
item.dc:creator: areaconnect
item.content:encoded:
The delivery business is one of the most lucrative businesses in Nigeria. It is a business that doesn’t require much capital before you can start it.
The major steps to follow while starting a delivery business are:
Creating a legal business identity. Before commencing a delivery business, you need to establish a valid or formal business personality. Focus on one or two delivery businesses. Try your best to make sure that you are acknowledged in your business. Create awareness. Advertise your business. Let people know that you are into it.
Setting up business accounts. To succeed in the delivery business, you need to set up your business account. An account where people pay in money to. The account should be a valid one. Creating & defining your brand. To create and define your brand you need to do research concerning your target audience and your competitors. Try to pick your focus and personality. Let people know your business name. Choose how you want your brand to look by considering the colors and fonts. Design your brand logo and then apply your branding across your business.
Acquire potential clients. The delivery business is lucrative but it is more profitable when you acquire potential clients. Meet people who value delivery services like bankers, marketers, teachers, lawyers, etc. Start With a Solid Plan. Before you start a delivery business, you need to set your plans, a solid one. The plan will make you stay consistently in the business. State your objectives, your strategies, etc, and try to follow them.
Decide on Your Location. Location matters a lot in the delivery business. Stay close to places where companies, industries, markets, restaurants, etc are far. They will make them require your services easily. An urban region is best for this business to allow you to maintain track of your customers and reach them in time. Choose Your Name and Structure. Choose attractive names and structures for your delivery business. The delivery business is not a costly business start up; you can begin with just #100,000 naira. You can create a business/brand name and logo. For instance, the leading e-commerce companies that deliver packages to individuals include Jumia, Konga, AreaConnect. You can partner with them or create your name and structure.
Getting the Word Out to Customers. Before you start a business delivery, make sure that you have good communication skills. Learn to get words out to your customers. Be polite and humble. Know the kind of words you use on people. Don’t discriminate. Create a Budget: Before you begin any delivery business, you are expected to create a business plan. You need the business plan because you’ll probably be working out of your home, your plan will primarily consist of monetary expenditures and requirements.
Here, you decide how to charge your customer or in any delivery. You need to decide whether your charges should be either by time or distance. You need to charge them based on how much you spent while delivering the packages to them. For example, if you spend #3,000 delivering to closer places, it is not in your place to charge #4,500. You can consider adding fuel or mileage surcharges for longer routes.
Keep Up Your Reputation: After you start your delivery business off the ground, you need to establish lasting relationships with repeat customers. You need to consider creating a loyalty program, such as free delivery for every 15 deliveries or package deals for businesses that give a flat rate for a specific number of deliveries per week. Check out what makes you the best deal for your customers, and play to your strengths. This will enable them to trust you and they would always like to patronize you.
Conclusion
On close observation, the delivery business has expanded to the extent that it has appeared to be one of the most lucrative businesses you can venture in. Remember that you can start home delivery with a little capital. Delivery business doesn’t require much capital before it could be established. You can make money through the delivery business by accepting delivery to your prospective clients.

To become an Areaconnect Delivery Agent, simply means your shops or kiosks are used as service centres for Delivery services, meaning customers can come to your shops to order for logistics services; dispatch bikes, van, trucks, interstate and international couriers, and you earn commissions on every delivery service offered.
As an Agent you are connected via our app and chatbot to the largest network of logistics operators, so that at the click of a button, you post the customer's order and within an hour an operator will pickup from you to deliver.

item.title: REQUIREMENTS FOR NIPOST LICENSE PARTNERSHIP
item.dc:creator: areaconnect
item.content:encoded: 1. Fill the Registration Form below 2. Upload Copies of your hackney permit or vehicle license 3. Pay 15k license fee per bike and upload the proof of payment and subsequently 1k monthly for renewal. 4. Read through the MOU and guidelines because by submitting the form, you agree to the terms and conditions. 5. Fill and Submit the form 6. You will be contacted thereafter, to add you to the LICENSED PARTNERS GROUP and to prepare your brand design. 7. Your brand design will be posted in the Licensed partners group,then you can send your rider/driver to our office for branding and the license/ inclusion documents. The whole process takes 24 hours PAY DIRECTLY INTO OUR BANK ACCOUNT BELOW: Acc No: 0123998022 Acc Name: AREACONNECT Bank: WEMA BANK TO REGISTER FOR NIPOST PARTNERSHIP, FILL THE REGISTRATION FORM BELOW: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScPxDqwllVOlQSorD4wltqNKlSTQ2WBr1VljbHlYUwvL6-ONg/viewform?usp=sf_link

The GOLDLINE APP https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imotionnigeria.goldline (Take note, the Goldline app is only for dispatch bikes orders for now and it is a bulking app, meaning it takes your order and other orders around you and pairs them, so that the rider picks up multiple orders in one trip, going to the same area) 3. The Goldline ChatBot on WhatsApp: +234 813 896 9994 (simply send hi to this number on whatsapp and wait for response, choose your option and follow the prompts to place your order for Dispatch bikes, Vans, trucks, interstate/international etc.) 4. item.title: ALLSHOP APP - BUY, SELL & DELIVER
item.dc:creator: areaconnect
item.content:encoded: This is where online stores make more sales with little effort getting products to their customers as buying, selling and delivery meets and become one. Allshop is a multivendor e-commerce platform (app and website). It consists of the AllShop customer app, AllShop vendor app and Allshop delivery app. Sell on All Shop and Areaconnect delivers. What are you waiting for, start selling on the most anticipated online store in Nigeria. Sell your food, your cars, clothes, shoes even your puff puff and akara. This is a revolutionary online store where buying, selling and delivery is made easy. All you need do is go on the website: https://allshopconnect.com Register with your email and password, after which you download the app on you Andriod device or iOS device and sign up with the email and password you registered with on the website Google play store link for Andriod: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.allshopconnect.user.app&fbclid=IwAR1mQaBp15WVuEkGXPhDsoqrHYv3Mjs6XYL9EMQOkSzdjbR8zxSGjYaaU7I&pli=1 iOS app store link for iPhone: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/allshop-vendor/id1618923127 Once you've signed into the app then you upload your products or services and begin making money.

item.title: HIRE-PURCHASE (AREAHIRE APP)
item.dc:creator: areaconnect
item.content:encoded: Are you a rider or a driver and you are in need of a car or a bike to enable you hustle, make more and pay your bills? Then you are at the right place as we at AreaConnect has found the permanent solution to hire-purchase issues. We give out cars and bikes on hire purchase. You see with our Area-Hire app we've got you totally covered, All you need do is download the "Area Hire" app by i-Motion Nigeria on google play store on your android device or iOS app store on your apple device. Android link https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.area.hire iOS link https://apps.apple.com/app/id1632423383 After you download the app, register on it with your email and password, then you sign in. Upload the required documents, browse through our gallery of various cars and bikes choose the one you so desire and a payment plan which suites you and make a purchase.
